RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE DEFENDER steady drive. LIL BITA KING drifted in, speed, outkicked. GOING TO B MIRACLE broke in, mid pack duel. AZOOMN BYE mid pack duel. TDZ JES A KING drifted in, game try. EXCITED MISSY lost contact.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JIMS CAPO speed, best. BIG EZZY JESS veered in sharply, bothered foes. TAKEMETOTHECANDYSHOP fought gamely. THREATLEVELMIDNIGHT reluctant, solid try. JESS DOWN THE RAPIDS close up, out kicked. J BEST QUEEN steady effort. TWO POLLITICAL ducked in midway. SA LA JOLLAS MIRACLE off slow, erratic trip. IMPRESSIVE BROOK eliminated start. EL GUY eliminated start. A STEWARDS INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO RUNNING SHORTLY AFTER BREAK, AFTE A REVIEW THE STEWARDS DECLARED THAT BIG EZZY JESS CAUSED INTERFERENCE AFTER THE START AND DISQUALIFIED BIG EZZY JESS FROM SECOND TO LAST.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 12100. FOR COLORADO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCYS MAJOR MIRCLE went to the front to set the pace, was challenged at the quarter pole and battled in the stretch but dug in late to prevail. DOCS CARO CAT was off the pace from three wide down the backstretch then moved up at the three furlong marker to engage the leader at the quarter pole and battled down the stretch but lacked the late response and was second best. TIME TO SKIP TOWN prompted the pace to the half mile marker then fell back around the turn, made a mild rail bid in the stretch to be the best of the rest. CENTAURUS saved ground down the backstretch then moved to two wide on the turn and passed tiring rivals in the stretch. HOLY MISSION raced four wide down the backstretch then tipped into three wide and moved up on the turn but tired in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Lucys Major Mircle
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, challenged 1/4, dug in, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Time to Skip Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, fell back turn, rail bid, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Docs Caro Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3w, bid 3/8, engaged 1/4, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, mild bid turn, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Allowance Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR $8,000 CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAGER NO MO was allowed to settled down the backstretch then moved up around the turn and went three wide at the eighth pole to drive past the dueling leaders to prove best. OREGON COUNTY tracked the leaders from three or four wide through the turn then moved out to five wide at the top of the stretch to rally for the place. PREACHER was off the pace down the backstretch then moved up to vie for the lead around the turn and dueled down the stretch while fighting gamely. MOONLITE GRAHAM sprinted to the lead then was challenged around the turn and dueled down the stretch but was over taken in mid stretch and had no late kick. A GEM IS A GEM was forwardly placed from three wide to the eighth pole and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Wager No Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, bid turn, 3w1/8, drove past, best

ENTRY.NAME: Preacher
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, vied for lead, engaged, dueled, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 14500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REVIVAL tracked the leaders from off the rail then moved out to four wide at the half mile marked, moved up going around the turn while gaining momentum, was three wide in upper stretch to run past the leaders and cruise home. BEDROCK went to a pressured lead and was headed at the quarter pole but fought gamely to be second best. WHEELER DEALER hopped at the start then rushed up from three wide to vie for the lead through the turn and tired. AVALON KING pressed the early pace from the inside to the half mile marker then dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Revival
ENTRY.OWNER: K Bar K Enterprises and We Are Blessed Racing

ENTRY.NAME: Bedrock
ENTRY.OWNER: Christian Bill Christian Billy and Kent Bern B
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured lead, headed 1/4, gamely, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Wheeler Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, rushed up, vied 3w, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARLET COLE went to an unchallenged lead to set all the pace and won going away. WHEREDIDITGO raced in the second flight from between horses but was no match for the winner. ISLAND BEAUTY went three wide in the second flight to the quarter pole and weakened. CANDIED JOULE saved ground in the second flight to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Starlet Cole
ENTRY.COMMENT: unchallenged lead, set pace, going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CTBA Lassie S. ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 47. Stakes Purse 34803. PURSE $34,803. Two year old Colorado Bred fillies. Weight 120 lbs. Nominations contact CTBA.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SNUGGLE BUNNY stalked the pace down the backstretch then saved ground around the turn going three wide in upper stretch, ran down the leader to be up in the final jump. LONG MAY SHE RUN co-led from the two path to the five sixteenths pole then inched away near the quarter pole and took a clear lead at the three sixteenths but was nailed in the final jump. FLY FREE raced near the back on the backstretch then moved up from two wide on the turn but was no match for the top two. I'M A TRUMPER was slightly unsettled in the gate before the start, then co-led to mid turn and tired. I'M GONE tracked the leaders while saving ground but never made a bid. ROGUE MOON trailed the field and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Long May She Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: co-led, inch away 1/4, clear lead3/16, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Fly Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 2wturn, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Snuggle Bunny
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, saved ground turn, ran down leader, up final jump

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 6000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEORGIANO went to a clear early lead in the first quarter then was challenged near the three furlong marked but inched away at mid turn and drew clear in the stretch. HOT LIL MESS rushed up to prompt the pace from the two path but couldn't catch the leader and proved second best. REMARKABLE CHARM trailed the field to the turn then made a rail bid on the turn and showed late effort in the stretch to be along for the show. DONNAS FINAL WORD was off the pace on the inside and made a mild bid into the stretch but failed to menace. IMA FINAL DE BUY vied for the lead from three wide at the half mile marker then slowly weakened. KALLINIKI raced near the back, went five wide around the turn but never made a bid. HIGH VALUE TARGET raced in the middle of the pack through the turn then dropped back and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Donnas Final Word
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild bid, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Georgiano
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear early lead, challenged 3/8, inch away, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Remarkable Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rail bid turn, late effort

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Lil Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, prompt pace, couldn't catch, second best,
